column1: Baby Barnaby's////I came here with a couple of other first-timers
column2: and we all went straight for the Green Eggs (thanks to Yelp for the recommendation)
column3: and it delivered big time. We agreed
column5: that the eggs were a bit buttery and overloaded with cheese--making it runnier than the average scrambled egg--but it complemented everything else on the plate perfectly and was more than a well-crafted entree
column6: in terms of flavor and balance. Â The eggs came with a perfectly-toasted slice of bread
column8: and a couple of AMAZING chicken apple sausages (never knew sweet and salty could taste THIS good!).
